    • Method Detail

      • addApiKeyToGroups

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @POST(value="v3/api-keys/{apikey_id}/groups")
retrofit2.Call<UpdatedResponse> addApiKeyToGroups(@Path(value="apikey_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String apikeyId,
                                                                                                                                                   @Body
                                                                                                                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> body)
        Add API key to a list of groups. Add API key to groups. **Example:** ``` curl -X POST https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/api-keys/{apikey_id}/groups \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ -d '[\"0162056a9a1586f30242590700000000\",\"0117056a9a1586f30242590700000000\"]' ```
        Parameters:
        apikeyId - The ID of the API key to add to the group. (required)
        body - A list of IDs of the groups to update. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<UpdatedResponse>

      • createApiKey

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @POST(value="v3/api-keys")
retrofit2.Call<ApiKeyInfoResp> createApiKey(@Body
                                                                                                                          ApiKeyInfoReq body)
        Create a new API key. Create a new API key. **Example:** ``` curl -X POST https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/api-keys -d '{\"name\": \"MyKey1\"}' \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' ```
        Parameters:
        body - The details of the API key to create. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<ApiKeyInfoResp>

      • deleteApiKey

        @DELETE(value="v3/api-keys/{apikey_id}")
retrofit2.Call<java.lang.Void> deleteApiKey(@Path(value="apikey_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                      java.lang.String apikeyId)
        Delete API key. Delete the API key. **Example:** ``` curl -X DELETE https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/api-keys/{apikey_id} \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        apikeyId - The ID of the API key to delete. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<Void>

      • getAllApiKeys

        @GET(value="v3/api-keys")
retrofit2.Call<ApiKeyInfoRespList> getAllApiKeys(@Query(value="limit")
                                                                            java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                            @Query(value="after")
                                                                            java.lang.String after,
                                                                            @Query(value="order")
                                                                            java.lang.String order,
                                                                            @Query(value="include")
                                                                            java.lang.String include,
                                                                            @Query(value="key__eq")
                                                                            java.lang.String keyEq,
                                                                            @Query(value="owner__eq")
                                                                            java.lang.String ownerEq)
        Get all API keys. Retrieve API keys in an array, optionally filtered by the owner. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/api-keys \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        limit - The number of results to return (2-1000). Default 50. (optional, default to 50)
        after - The entity ID to fetch after the given one. (optional)
        order - Record order based on creation time. Acceptable values: ASC, DESC. Default: ASC. (optional, default to ASC)
        include - Comma-separated additional data to return. Currently supported: total_count. (optional)
        keyEq - API key filter. Do not include the private portion of the API key (the last 32 characters). (optional)
        ownerEq - Owner name filter. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<ApiKeyInfoRespList>

      • getApiKey

        @GET(value="v3/api-keys/{apikey_id}")
retrofit2.Call<ApiKeyInfoResp> getApiKey(@Path(value="apikey_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                java.lang.String apikeyId)
        Get API key details. Retrieve API key details. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/api-keys/{apikey_id} \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        apikeyId - The ID of the API key to retrieve. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<ApiKeyInfoResp>

      • getGroupsOfApikey

        @GET(value="v3/api-keys/{apikey_id}/groups")
retrofit2.Call<GroupSummaryList> getGroupsOfApikey(@Path(value="apikey_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                 java.lang.String apikeyId,
                                                                                                 @Query(value="limit")
                                                                                                 java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                                                 @Query(value="after")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String after,
                                                                                                 @Query(value="order")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String order,
                                                                                                 @Query(value="include")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String include)
        Get groups of the API key. Retrieve groups associated with the API key. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/api-keys/{apikey_id}/groups \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        apikeyId - The ID of the API key. (required)
        limit - The number of results to return (2-1000). Default 50. (optional, default to 50)
        after - The entity ID to fetch after the given one. (optional)
        order - Record order based on creation time. Acceptable values: ASC, DESC. Default: ASC. (optional, default to ASC)
        include - Comma-separated additional data to return. Currently supported: total_count. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<GroupSummaryList>

      • removeApiKeyFromGroups

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @DELETE(value="v3/api-keys/{apikey_id}/groups")
retrofit2.Call<UpdatedResponse> removeApiKeyFromGroups(@Path(value="apikey_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String apikeyId,
                                                                                                                                                          @Body
                                                                                                                                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> body)
        Remove API key from groups. Remove API key from groups. **Example:** ``` curl -X DELETE https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/api-keys/{apikey_id}/groups \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ -d '[\"0162056a9a1586f30242590700000000\",\"0117056a9a1586f30242590700000000\"]' ```
        Parameters:
        apikeyId - The ID of the API key to remove from the group. (required)
        body - A list of IDs of the groups to update. (required)

        Call<UpdatedResponse>

        Parameters:
